1 = 1

mapper.update: UPDATE apk SET name = #{name}, version = #{version}, url = #{url}, so_urls = #{soUrls}, size = #{size}, md5 = #{md5}, description = #{description}, package_name = #{packageName}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apk ( id, name, description, version, size, md5, url, so_urls, package_name, create_by, create_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md5}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{soUrls}, #{packageName}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks} )
